mapper.select: SELECT l.fid,m.fid machineid,m.fequipment_no,m.finsframework_id,fstatus,d.fvaluename,ftype,dic.fvaluename,fUploadDataTime time FROM tb_warn l INNER JOIN tb_welding_machine m on m.fid = l.fmachine_id INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d on d.fvalue = fstatus INNER JOIN tb_dictionary dic on dic.fvalue = ftype where (d.ftypeid=9 and dic.ftypeid=7) and f.fid = #{id}
